trans-unit.source: Defines a keyboard combination that can be used to invoke a command.
trans-unit.target: Define uma combinação de teclado que pode ser utilizada para invocar um comando.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, a KeyGesture must be associated with one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, um KeyGesture tem de ser associado com um ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>

trans-unit.source: The exceptions to this rule are the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, which can be a valid KeyGesture by themselves.
trans-unit.target: As exceções a esta regra são as teclas de função e as chaves de teclado numérico, que podem ser um KeyGesture válido por si mesmos.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can create a KeyGesture by using only the F12 key, but to use the X key in a KeyGesture it must be paired with a modifier key.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode criar um KeyGesture utilizando apenas a tecla F12, mas a utilizar o X chave num KeyGesture têm de fazer par com uma chave de modificador.

trans-unit.source: In general, you can You can use a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> to bind a KeyGesture to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, so that the command is invoked when the KeyGesture occurs.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, é possível pode utilizar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>vincular um KeyGesture para um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, para que o comando é invocado quando ocorre a KeyGesture.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>

trans-unit.source: For KeyGesture [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usages, the property that is generally set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>, in cases where the gesture represents both a standard key and a modifier key.
trans-unit.target: Para KeyGesture [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] utilizações, a propriedade que geralmente é definida no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] é <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>, nos casos em que o gesto representa uma chave padrão e uma chave de modificador.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> property to be just a function key, or just a modifier key combination.
trans-unit.target: Também pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>combinação de chave de propriedade deve ser apenas uma tecla de função ou apenas um modificador.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, it is more common to set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> property if the intended command binding is a function key with no modifiers, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A> if the intended command binding is for modifier keys only.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, é mais comum para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>propriedade se o enlace de comando prevista é uma chave de função com nenhuma modificadores, ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A>se o enlace de comando que se destinam destina-se apenas a chaves de modificador.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values `functionKey` A single key value, which must be one of the function keys (F1-12) or numeric keypad keys.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML ``` - or - ``` # # XAML valores `functionKey` um valor de chave único, que tem de ser as teclas de função (F1-12) ou chaves de teclado numérico.

trans-unit.source: `oneOrMoreModifierKeys` One or more modifier keys, defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> enumeration, delimited with a "+" character.
trans-unit.target: `oneOrMoreModifierKeys`Um ou mais chaves de modificador, definidas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>enumeração, delimitada por um caráter "+".</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>

trans-unit.source: `key` <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> A single key value.
trans-unit.target: `key` <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>Um valor de chave único.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> must be associated with one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>tem de ser associado a um ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: The exceptions to this rule are the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, which can be a valid <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> by themselves.

trans-unit.target: A chave associada este gesto.

trans-unit.source: The exceptions to this rule are the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, which can be a valid <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> by themselves.
trans-unit.target: As exceções a esta regra são as teclas de função e as chaves de teclado numérico, que podem ser um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>por si mesmos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref>, and display string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"> </xref>e a cadeia de apresentação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.DisplayString%2A> property is set to the `displayString` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.DisplayString%2A>propriedade está definida como o `displayString` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.DisplayString%2A>

trans-unit.target: A chave associada o gesto.

trans-unit.source: The modifier keys associated with the gesture.
trans-unit.target: As chaves de modificador associadas o gesto.

trans-unit.target: Uma representação de cadeia do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: modifiersis not a valid -or- key is not a valid .

trans-unit.target: displayStringis .

trans-unit.target: keye modifiers seguintes não formam um .

trans-unit.source: Gets a string representation of this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma representação de cadeia deste <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a display string was not set in the constructor, an empty string is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se uma cadeia de apresentação não foi definida no construtor, é devolvida uma cadeia vazia.

trans-unit.source: If this property is empty, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.GetDisplayStringForCulture%2A> method returns a string created from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se esta propriedade está vazia, o <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.GetDisplayStringForCulture%2A>método devolve uma cadeia criada a partir do <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.GetDisplayStringForCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The display string for this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de apresentação para esta <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that can be used to display the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que pode ser utilizada para apresentar o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the display string was set by the constructor, that string is returned; otherwise, a string is created from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> with any necessary conversions being governed by the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: Se a cadeia de apresentação foi definida pelo construtor, o que é devolveu uma cadeia; caso contrário, é criada uma cadeia a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A>com quaisquer conversões necessárias que está a ser regidos por especificado <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A>

trans-unit.source: The culture specific information.
trans-unit.target: As informações específicas do idioma.

trans-unit.source: The string to display
trans-unit.target: A cadeia a apresentar

trans-unit.source: Gets the key associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave associada a este <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> must be associated with one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>tem de ser associado a um ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: The exceptions to this rule are the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, which can be a valid <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> by themselves.
trans-unit.target: As exceções a esta regra são as teclas de função e as chaves de teclado numérico, que podem ser um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>por si mesmos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: The key associated with the gesture.
trans-unit.target: A chave associada o gesto.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref> matches the input associated with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se este <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref> corresponde a entrada associada especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: `targetElement` can be used to make a more specific decision on whether a command should be invoked on a specific element.
trans-unit.target: `targetElement`pode ser utilizado para tomar uma decisão mais específica no se um comando deve ser invocado num elemento específico.

trans-unit.source: The target.
trans-unit.target: O destino.

trans-unit.source: The input event data to compare this gesture to.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de evento de entrada para comparar este gesto para.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event data matches this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dados de evento corresponder a este <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the modifier keys associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as chaves de modificador associadas a este <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> must be associated with one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>tem de ser associado a um ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: The exceptions to this rule are the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, which can be a valid <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> by themselves.
trans-unit.target: As exceções a esta regra são as teclas de função e as chaves de teclado numérico, que podem ser um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>por si mesmos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> by using only the F12 key, but to use the X key in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> it must be paired with a modifier key.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode criar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>utilizando apenas a tecla F12, chave but para utilizar o X num <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>deve ser emparelhado com uma chave de modificador.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: The modifier keys associated with the gesture.
trans-unit.target: As chaves de modificador associadas o gesto.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"> </xref>.
